Title: Aalo Chhaya
Writer: Saratchandra Chatterjee (novel), Monojit Goswami (lyrics), Anasuya Samanta (screenplay), Rabindranath Tagore (lyrics)
Actors: Sanghamitra Bandyopadhyay, Ramaprasad Banik, Bibhu Bhattacharya, Mou Bhattacharyya
Plot: Aranyo and his friends set out an adventurous weekend and reach an old mansion. There they meet an old man who starts to tell them the history of the place, the story of 'Aalo' and 'Chhaya'...
